Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Submitting the name of Estrellita Brodsky to the Council for its advice and consent regarding her appointment to the New York City Art Commission, for the remainder of a three year term, expiring December 31, 2003, pursuant to Section 31 and 851 of the New York City Charter.
Items.MatterName: Estrellita Brodsky, NYC Art Commission Appointment

Items.Title:
Report of the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections approving the appointment by the Mayor  of ESTRELLITA BRODSKY as a Member of the New York City Art Commission.


The Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections which referred to on May 9, 2001, respectfully

REPORTS

Pursuant to Section 31 and Section 851 of the New York City Charter, the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections hereby approves the appointment by the Mayor of ESTRELLITA BRODSKY as a Member of the New York City Art Commission, for the remainder of a three year term, which will expire on December 31, 2003.

Res. No. 1964

RESOLUTION APPROVING THE APPOINTMENT BY THE MAYOR OF ESTRELLITA BRODSKY AS A MEMBER OF THE NEW YORK CITY ART COMMISSION 

By Council Member Povman

RESOLVED, that pursuant to Section 31 and Section 851 of the New York City Charter, the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections hereby approves the appointment by the Mayor of ESTRELLITA BRODSKY as a Member of the New York City Art Commission, for the remainder of a three year term, which will expire on December 31, 2003.
Items.MatterName: M 1132 - Estrellita Brodsky, NYC Art Commission Appointment

Rules, Privileges, and Elections

Report of the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections approving the appointment by the Mayor  of ESTRELLITA BRODSKY as a Member of the New York City Art Commission.


The Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections which referred to on May 9, 2001, respectfully

REPORTS

Pursuant to Section 31 and Section 851 of the New York City Charter, the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections hereby approves the appointment by the Mayor of ESTRELLITA BRODSKY as a Member of the New York City Art Commission, for the remainder of a three year term, which will expire on December 31, 2003.

Res. No. 1964

RESOLUTION APPROVING THE APPOINTMENT BY THE MAYOR OF ESTRELLITA BRODSKY AS A MEMBER OF THE NEW YORK CITY ART COMMISSION 

By Council Member Povman

RESOLVED, that pursuant to Section 31 and Section 851 of the New York City Charter, the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections hereby approves the appointment by the Mayor of ESTRELLITA BRODSKY as a Member of the New York City Art Commission, for the remainder of a three year term, which will expire on December 31, 2003.
Items.MatterName: M 1132 - Estrellita Brodsky, NYC Art Commission Appointment
